resources.name: italki
resources.description: Find Japanese tutors for conversation practice.
resources.descriptionLong: italki connects you with professional Japanese tutors and community tutors for one-on-one conversation practice. Book lessons at times that work for you and practice speaking with native speakers via video chat.
resources.notes: Best platform for finding Japanese tutors.

resources.name: Preply Japanese
resources.descriptionLong: Preply offers online Japanese tutoring with qualified teachers. The platform matches you with tutors based on your goals and schedule, providing personalized conversation practice and lessons.

resources.name: Verbling Japanese
resources.descriptionLong: Verbling provides video-based Japanese lessons with professional tutors. The platform offers structured lessons and conversation practice with native speakers.

resources.name: HelloTalk
resources.description: Language exchange app for finding conversation partners.
resources.descriptionLong: HelloTalk connects you with native Japanese speakers who want to learn your language. Practice through text, voice messages, and calls. The app includes correction features and translation tools.
resources.notes: Great for finding language exchange partners.

resources.name: Tandem
resources.descriptionLong: Tandem is a language exchange app that connects you with native Japanese speakers. Practice through text, voice messages, and video calls while helping others learn your language.

resources.name: Dogen's Phonetics Course
resources.descriptionLong: Dogen's Patreon course is the most comprehensive resource for learning Japanese pitch accent. The course covers the rules of pitch accent, common patterns, and provides extensive practice materials for sounding natural.
resources.notes: The gold standard for pitch accent learning.

resources.name: OJAD (Online Japanese Accent Dictionary)
resources.description: Free pitch accent dictionary and learning tool.
resources.descriptionLong: OJAD is a free online tool for looking up Japanese pitch accent patterns. It includes a dictionary, text-to-speech with pitch visualization, and verb conjugation accent patterns. Essential for pronunciation study.
resources.notes: Essential free tool for pitch accent study.

resources.name: Japanese Pronunciation Trainer
resources.nameJa: 日本語発音トレーナー
resources.descriptionLong: Japanese Pronunciation Trainer helps you practice Japanese sounds and pitch accent. The app provides audio examples and allows you to record and compare your pronunciation.

resources.name: Cambly
resources.descriptionLong: Cambly offers on-demand conversation practice with tutors. While primarily for English learning, some tutors offer Japanese conversation practice. Good for spontaneous speaking practice.
resources.notes: Limited Japanese tutors but flexible scheduling.

resources.name: Speechling
resources.description: Speaking practice with native speaker feedback.
resources.descriptionLong: Speechling provides speaking practice with feedback from native Japanese speakers. Record yourself speaking and receive corrections on pronunciation, intonation, and naturalness.
resources.priceDetails: Free tier with limited recordings. Premium for unlimited.
resources.notes: Get personalized feedback on your speaking.
